org.jscsi.target.util

Class SerialArithmeticNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jscsi.target.util.SerialArithmeticNumber

  • public final class SerialArithmeticNumber
extends Object
    A class for serial number arithmetics, as defined in [RFC 1982], with SERIAL_BITS = 32.

    Unlike the original algorithm, this implementation is based on unsigned subtraction, resolving the issue of undefined comparisons, however introducing one additional oddity - each member of a pair of serial numbers with a wrapped distance of 2^(SERIAL_BITS - 1) will be considered less than (and greater than) the other one.

    Author:
    Andreas Ergenzinger
